## vision\_v1p1beta1.Schema$GoogleCloudVisionV1p2beta1Position interface

A 3D position in the image, used primarily for Face detection landmarks. A valid Position must have both x and y coordinates. The position coordinates are in the same scale as the original image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Schema$GoogleCloudVisionV1p2beta1Position 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [x](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_googlecloudvisionv1p2beta1position.x.md) | number \| null | X coordinate. |
|  [y](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_googlecloudvisionv1p2beta1position.y.md) | number \| null | Y coordinate. |
|  [z](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_googlecloudvisionv1p2beta1position.z.md) | number \| null | Z coordinate (or depth). |
